title: Vladimir Kurayev
text:
Vladimir Petrovich Kurayev (; born 10 June 1969) is a former <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a>er. 
Club career.
He made his professional debut in the <a href="Soviet%20First%20League">Soviet First League</a> in 1986 for <a href="FC%20Spartak%20Ordzhonikidze">FC Spartak Ordzhonikidze</a>. He played 3 games in the <a href="UEFA%20Intertoto%20Cup%201997">UEFA Intertoto Cup 1997</a> for <a href="FC%20Lokomotiv%20Nizhny%20Novgorod">FC Lokomotiv Nizhny Novgorod</a>.
Personal life.
His son <a href="Dmitri%20Kurayev">Dmitri Kurayev</a> is also a footballer.
